author: Emily Fuchs (she/they)
title: Final Exam Instructions
question:
The following page has everything you need to know about the Final Exam. Please take the time to read the instructions slowly and carefully now, as they are essential in helping you prepare for the exam and you are responsible for knowing their content. 
  You should save/bookmark the exam instructions page now, as Piazza access will be blocked 30 minutes before the exam. 
  http://cs110.students.cs.ubc.ca/exam-instructions.html
